resources.string: Connect with people around the world
User will be able to give you live, chat and meet with people nearby.
Let\'s build connection with new people
Connect helps you locate the people around you who are closest from your home.
User will be able to give you live, chat and meet with people nearby.
I accept the terms of service.
Are you sure you want to logout?
Are you sure you want to delete your account? This decision cannot be taken back.
Are you sure you want to logout of your account?
Are you sure you want to delete your Student Intellect account?
Anything that can validate your knowledge in the subjects you tutor, such as university qualifications or final matric marks.
E.g. I am a 2nd year mathematics student at Wits University and got 92% for mathematics in matric.
I agree to Student Intellect\'s terms & conditions
Anything that validates your knowledge in the subjects you tutor in (e.g. university or final matric marks).
Are you sure you want to logout you student profile?

Your account was found to be in violation of our Terms of Service, and has thus been suspended from our platform. Please contact us at support@studentintellect.co.za if you believe this to be a mistake.
Sorry! We cannot connect to the server. What would you like to do?
To access our papers and tutoring, you will need to create a free account.
Turn on your data or connect to a WiFi network, and we\'ll guide you through it in no time!
Cancelling, required permissions are not granted
This tutor is not associated with Student Intellect any more
Do you have to do it now?
Don\'t stress, if you only pick one now you can always set up the other one later.
What term in the compound formula change when using quarterly interest rate instead of annual?
Each tutor interaction costs you, the student, R10. We need card details for you to use this service.
There is already an account associated with this email address.
Tell us about any of your past teaching/tutoring roles. If you don\'t have any, don\'t stress — just explain why you\'re going to be a fantastic tutor!
E.g. I\'ve been a private maths tutor for 2 years and am passionate about helping students learn!
Or, talk to us directly! How can we improve? Report bugs, make a complaint, or tell us what you would like to see in Student Intellect.

Fill out the application form below. When you tap ‘Submit’, you’ll be taken to an email with all the information you just filled out. Attach a copy of your ID and tap send. We’ll review your application and get back to you within 24 hours!
We only need your details to pay you. Tutoring on Student Intellect is 100% free. You earn 70% commission for every answer you provide!
We will get back to you within 48 hours.
Get cash for every answer you give. See how to answer questions and apply for verification by completing 3 quick steps!
Get cash for every answer you give, as well as a sweet badge next to your name to show that you are a trusted tutor.
How would you like to sign up?
If you don’t have any tutoring experience, that’s OK! Tell us why you’re going to be a great tutor!
We only need your details so that we can pay you.
question will be added to your list.
Let\'s set up your student profile!
Let\'s set up your tutor profile!
Show your appreciation by liking posts.\10Save posts to learn from later.
e.g. I\'m currently studying at the University of Mars but I tutor in my spare time…

Marking guidelines (memoranda) on Student Intellect should be treated as just that: rough guidelines intended for markers.\10\10The answers shown may not be the only answers to the questions. However, they are methods for which markers are most likely to award full marks.
Finish 3 tasks to master Student Intellect.
You need to grant access to
You don\'t have any direct questions yet!
Sorry! This document could not be found on your device. Would you like to try re-downloading it?
You haven\'t downloaded any papers yet!
You don\'t have any saved posts yet!
You haven\'t answered any questions yet!
You don\'t have a tutor profile yet!
No questions to answer right now!
No questions on your waiting list yet!
Type it,take a photo, or post a video.\10 Get an answer in minutes
Would you like to try reconnect?
Nope. If you’re here for the free resources or to search our database of tutor answers, skip this step. You can always setup your card details later..
View the ad you saved when you were offline
You\'ll get a notification with the link when you\'re back online
We\'ll send you a notification with a link to the advertiser site.
Open ad when you\'re back online.
We need your account details so you can be paid!
Payment occurs only when \10you accept the tutor
Please enter email valid email to login
Other users can view this interaction.
You were in the middle of answering a question. Would you like to continue?
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Search for your subjects and then select them below, they’ll appear here.
Please note that you will only be paid once you\'ve been verified. Do this in the Profile section once you\'ve finished here — it\'ll only take 5 minutes.
e.g. First year university literature student
Your question seems quite short. Tutors are less likely to want to answer undetailed or vague questions!
Would you still like to continue?
How do you want to sign up?
Nice! Now let\'s get to know you a little bit.
What language(s) do you tutor in?
What education level(s) do you tutor?
Students will see this on your profile.
Ask questions and receive quick, affordable help.
Find and follow your favorite tutors.
Access all past papers and resources.
Clearly explain what you need help with using text, image, voice note, or video.
The first 2 questions are free! It then becomes pay-as-you-go, with you getting to pick your price.
Review the tutor\'s profile. When you accept a tutor, they begin answering your question.
Your tutor will send you an answer. View it and ask any follow up questions you might have.
Rate the answer and choose if you want to share it with the community or keep it private.
Explain what you need help with.
Be as clear and specific as possible. Use as much detail as you can.
Don\'t just ask for answers. Ask tutors to explain concepts or how you should approach the question.
A tutor will offer to answer your question.
Review their profile & accept their offer if you\'re happy. Select \'Decline\' if you would like a different tutor.
Ask any follow up questions you have that are relevant to the initial question.
Rate the answer you received. Was their answer clear and detailed?
Choose to help others by sharing it with the community, or keep it private.
Understand the question process and discover how to promote better learning.
Students are far more likely to choose you to answer their question if they know who you are.
Students who pay for their answers should only connect with the best tutors. Want to be certified as being one of the best? We’ll need to verify that you are who you say you are.
To read the full document just follow this link:
This interaction will be viewable by other users.
This will display underneath your name. Remember, short and sweet!
Ask questions and get help from verified tutors in minutes.
Discuss interactions made public by other users.
Follow and send direct questions\10to your favourite tutors.
Ask questions directly from\10past papers you are working from.
Post questions using media or ask from a paper you\'re working on.
Download and share resources for free.
Contribute your own resources to help expand\10our databse of learning content.
Past papers, memos & notes for all IEB/DBE subjects.
Connect with an active community of students & tutors.
Your student may have follow up questions. You don\'t have to answer them, but it is a great way to increase your rating and be the best tutor you can be.
Every question you answer will be rated by the student who receives it. Making sure your rating is as high as it can be is crucial for being chosen to answer future questions.
No one wants a rambling answer. Cover the needed content in the clearest and most concise way possible.
Keep it as short as you can
Don\'t use media for the sake of it. Make sure it has a purpose in answering your question. Don\'t shake when taking videos or images.
We don\'t want to just give answers.
We aim to explain concepts and methods in ways that give learners the tools to understand the content, allowing them to tackle future problems effectively.
We achieve this by covering 3 key qualities when answering questions.
We will cover these concepts below and illustrate how they can be applied using a question from the 2019 DBE mathematics paper 1 final. These concepts should be applied to any answer you give.
Do they want only an answer? Do they want you to explain the relevant concept? This decides how you should structure your answer, so understanding this is vital.
What response is the student asking for?
Your tutor cancelled their offer and your question has been reposted. We will find another tutor for you shortly!
Earn money by answering short questions.
Congrats, you\'ve just answered your fifth free question! Head on over to your to-do list to apply for Tutor Verification.
Do they only want an answer? Do they want you to explain the relevant concept? This is vital as it decides how you structure your answer.
Cover the needed content in the clearest and most concise way possible.
Photos, voice notes, and videos should have a clear purpose in answering your question.
Increase your rating by answering any follow up questions the student may have.
What did the student ask for?
Tutor help is just a tap away.
Use vocabulary that is appropriate to the education level of the question.
Explain the concept clearly and concisely, using an appropriate amount of detail.
Show all steps/working out, as well as succinctly defining the applied concepts.
User paragraphs to break up the content into sections. This organises relevant information and makes your answer easier to read.
Review your text before posting your answer. Make sure there aren\'t any typos or spelling mistakes.
Review you\'re text before posting you answer. Make sure their aren\'t any typos or spelling mitsakes.
Use a photo, voice note, or video to show working out or to capture an explanation.
Make sure the audio and visuals are clear and comprehensible throughout.
Remember that you don\'t have to use media. Only use it if you believe it will improve your answer.
Learn how to give quality answers that promote learning and earn you great ratings.
The basics of tutoring on Student Intellect
This username will be seen by other users.
Welcome to the team. You can now find the tutorial or contact us in the profile section.
We couldn\'t upload your file to our severs.

Student Intellect\'s primary goal is to make quality tutoring and resources accessible to all students with ease, promoting better learning in South African Universities.
